p: GC/MS analysis of the extract mixture revealed the presence of 38 compounds including; monoterpenes hydrocarbons (α-pinene, limonene, 0-cymene), monoterpene alcohols (linalool, α-terpineol), and sesquiterpene (Himbaccol, α-Selinene, ledol, Juniperol). All of these terpenoids are thought to cause membrane disruption that is triggered by the lipophilic compounds [ 39].
